author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #41016

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_13_0_X`.

This PR includes the integration of the JIRA tickets in [1], and has the following implications.

 - The GRun menu in this PR is compatible with the L1T menu [`L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_0_0`](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/blob/57fcce7ecf26366084813755f769f47be58bbf5f/development/L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_0_0/L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_0_0.html) [[tag]](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_0_0_xml) (see [CMSLITDPG-1102](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-1102)).

 - This 2023 L1T menu will be included by AlCa in the 2023/24 MC and Run-3 'data relval' GTs (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41007), while the 2022 MC GTs continue to use the last L1T menu of 2022. To comply with this, the alias `(HLT:)@relval2023` is introduced to run the GRun menu in the 2023/24 MC and Run-3 data RelVals. To pick up the appropriate HLT menu in all relevant wfs, changes in `Configuration/PyReleaseValidation` were needed.

[1]
  - [CMSHLT-2678](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2678): [HCAL] removed `L1_SingleMuOpen` seed from `HLT_HcalPhiSym_v` trigger
  - [CMSHLT-2687](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2687): [BPH] update of `Tau3Mu` triggers (2023 L1T seeds)
  - [CMSHLT-2688](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2688): [BPH] removed `L1_DoubleMu3er2p0_SQ_OS_dR_Max1p4` seed from BPH dimuon triggers
  - [CMSHLT-2689](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2689): [JME] use L1T-Jet-FWD2p5 seeds in `PFJetFwd` and `DiPFJetAve` triggers (2023 L1T seeds)
  - [CMSHLT-2690](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2690): [BTV] update of `BTagMu*DiJet` triggers (2023 L1T seeds)
  - [CMSHLT-2699](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2699): [HIG] added backup L1T VBFDiJetIsoTau seed (2023 L1T seed)

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#41016

Development of HLT menus for 2023 data-taking and Run-3 MC.
title: HLT menu development for `13_0_X` (4/N)
